Digital Music


Since 2020, Nicolas has used FL Studio to compose various digital music tracks, often for personal enjoyment but occasionally producing for others. Originally introduced to FL Studio during his piano lessons (which were partially turned into composition critiques), he has enjoyed making remixes of his favorite songs and creating original compositions. Some of which also have album covers created for them.

Take a listen to his library of works below.

Currently a senior at Santa Clara University, Nicolas Gibson is passionate about all things design, constantly learning new things and putting them into practice.
